text: Has anyone tried Tailwind CSS with HubSpot? What do you think? Would it make sense to you ?
Is there a way to redefine the styles of these button styles?
This is something we had plan on trying out but we haven’t yet. Since Tailwind is utility-based css, there’s no reason it can’t be anything but helpful if you’re building a theme on top of it, IMO.

We have a client that needs to merge 2 portals - they had one for Sales and one for Marketing.   Neither sides want to be the one to “export into the other” for fear of losing data. Exporting marketing side may lose analytics. Exporting contacts from sales side may lose contact history.  Does anyone have a recommendation as to which way is best?  Ideally, if HubSpot could merge the accounts that’d be great, but HS support said there’s nothing they could do.
